body: Why is HG down and when will it be fixed?
body_tagged: Why is HG down and when will it be fixed?
title: HG down?

replies.body: The Survival Games servers are not down, they currently are just idle, meaning that no-one is playing on any of the servers.
replies.body_tagged: The Survival Games servers are not down, they currently are just idle, meaning that no-one is playing on any of the servers.
